thread.title: Small hotel in good location
thread.title_full: Small hotel in good location - Review of Hotel Paris Rivoli, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Raymond P
title: Small hotel in good location
text:
Situated at the La Bastille end of the main thoroughfare Rue Rivoli (which extends almost to Place de la Concorde and Champs Elysee. 10 minutes walk from Notre Dame and 15 minutes from The Louvre. Hotel rooms are not large, but suffice and are clean and nicely furnished. Buffet breakfast is good and nicely presented. Staff were helpful and friendly.
